questions.question: Which of the following statements is true about combining passive and active attacks?

answers.a: Passive attacks are less dangerous than active attacks
answers.b: Active attacks are less detectable than passive attacks.
answers.c: Combining passive and active attacks can increase the success rate of an attack.
answers.d: Combining passive and active attacks can only be done by expert hackers.

questions.question: Which of the following best describes combining active and passive attacks in an ongoing computer in a network?
Which of the following is a type of replay attack?
What is the primary purpose of a TCP SYN Flood attack?

answers.a: To steal sensitive information from a target server
answers.b: To establish a connection with the target server
answers.c: To exhaust the server's resources by flooding it with incomplete connections
answers.d: To encrypt the data transmitted between the client and server

questions.question: Which of the following is true about a TCP SYN Flood attack?

answers.a: It causes the target server to crash by consuming all its memory
answers.b: It only affects the application layer of the OSI model
answers.c: It causes the target server to exhaust its half-open connections, preventing legitimate users from connecting
answers.d: It involves sending data packets with malicious content to exploit the target server

questions.question: Which layer of the OSI model is affected by a TCP SYN Flood attack?
During a TCP SYN Flood attack, what does the server expect after sending a SYN-ACK response?

answers.a: A confirmation from the attacker's IP
answers.b: An ACK packet from the client to complete the three-way handshake
answers.c: A data packet to establish the connection
answers.d: A SYN packet to initiate another connection attempt
